channel.title: No one posts anything good
channel.description:
I don't care if I get a warning for this, I just thought I'd share this with Moparscape.
It's been evident to me that more and more people are just taking other people's servers and releasing them as their own (only changing the home location, name, and or changing the coordinates of objects.)
The only real people that seem to be releasing valuable things have been: - Delta_ - Berky - Whiz` - primadude - Si Force - Silabsoft
There are plenty more that I'm leaving out and I apologize, but I'm sure you all get where I'm going.
Greets, Zeus14
PS- You're all probably wondering why I've never released anything special, but there will be a big release from me within a month that will amaze you all.

item.title: No one posts anything good
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

Uhm, there’s one thing you need to Understand.

EVERYONE LEACHES.
All sources were created by one person, so either way if you use a blank source. its leaching because someone else made it.

Read full topic

item.title: No one posts anything good
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

If you guys look back at what was released (in the original list), it’s just everything redone to that person’s needs. Then look at all the shit that they caused:

  • Delta_ - Does anyone NOT have a problem with that server?
  • Berky - Same as above ^
  • Whiz- No experience with Whiz’s material.
  • primadude - Same as above, but knowing prima… Yeah.
  • Si Force - Didn’t know he released anything
  • Silabsoft - When she released her client, the world went mad

Just because they released these spectacular things, doesn’t mean they’re good; they were just redone.

Read full topic

item.title: No one posts anything good
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

95% of the shit released these days is just that, shit.

also, this

Lin:

No one works hard on private servers because there’s no point. They’re low quality and never worth playing for more than a few days. When you can’t get atleast 1 stat to 99 within a few hours tops, then the server is lame and going to be boring. No one likes another RuneScape.

Read full topic

I think it is rather unfair that you have jumped to conclusions like this when you have only spent half a month here and posted four times. (Unless multiple accounts).

I personally think AuraDevil and peterbjornx have made a huge contribution towards client modification.

I have not released or said anything valuable so I wont disturb anyone…

item.title: No one posts anything good
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:8, topic:287368”]Delta_ - yes.
Berky - No.
Whiz`- Eh.
primadude - Yes.
Si Force - Eh.
Silabsoft - Not in at least a year?[/quote]

If you look at my past posts, I’ve hated delta since the day it was released. Not once did I say it was a bad release though, because it’s not. It’s just overrated and that’s why you’re saying no. I don’t like delta, so you can’t say that’s why I’m doing this, it’s just the fact that it’s a decent source and you’re not giving it credit.

Read full topic

item.title: No one posts anything good
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

No one works hard on private servers because there’s no point. They’re low quality and never worth playing for more than a few days. When you can’t get atleast 1 stat to 99 within a few hours tops, then the server is lame and going to be boring. No one likes another RuneScape.

Right now I’m remaking each skill to be perfect which is going great, but I still know that no one will play my server for weeks and weeks. There’s no point in it. And no, people aren’t just changing coordinates (Atleast most of them). Custom items, believe it or not, take effort if you want them to work properly. When trying to add wings to Bluurr’s client, I had to dig through other clients just to find the models, make my own ints, fix the models up, and make my own drop models. However, other ones like recolors, don’t take much effort. Other things do, and most people here haven’t been programming long enough to code something completely new and epic. Like Moparisthebest once said, most people come here to learn (If I remember what he said correctly).

Read full topic
